title: S74 Silks 1 Colored 4 White With Ad backs
author: ricktmd

posts.post_title: S74 Silks 1 Colored 4 White With Ad backs
posts.post_content:
Offered here is a group of 1 Very Nice Colored Silks of Davy Jones with the criss-cross baseball bat style and 4 white silks with Ad Backs. One is graded by SGC which is Elberfeld . All are Ex or better in my opinion with respect to SGC's grading on silks which doesn't account for the factory fold. Prices lowered from previous posts including the EXMT Schlei with the rare Turkey Red Frame back
